name: Killer Brains: Lab Rats
description:
It's big brain time

Explore brainhacking with this hard brain-based programming puzzle game. 

You are a mad scientist trying to build a killbot powered by rat brains. Using the handy BrainHacking101 Kit you bought off aliexpress, you assemble chips on a poor rat's brain and have him pilot your killrobot according to your instructions.

Features:

  • 7 Missions!
  • A bunch of brain chips!
  • Brain hacking!
  • Cool shader technology!
  • Robot murder!
  • Funny hijinks!

This is a game I made for the Secret Santa Game Jam, for Thomz. I hope you like it!
